snippet: The Edinburgh Airport and the National Galleries of Scotland agreed to put a white cover over a poster depicting Picasso's "Nude Woman in a Red Armchair" - though not without a rejoinder from gallery officials - and then they reversed the decision.
abstract: The Edinburgh Airport and the National Galleries of Scotland agreed to put a white cover over a poster depicting Picasso's "Nude Woman in a Red Armchair" - though not without a rejoinder from gallery officials - and then they reversed the decision.

headline.main: After Complaints, Picasso Nude at Airport Is Covered Up, Then Uncovered
headline.print_headline: Airport Plays Peekaboo With a Picasso Nude

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art
